title: ЛАПТОП DELL G16 7630 16" I9-13900HX/32GB DDR5/1TB/RTX 4060 8GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплей:16" (40.64cm)
Резолуција: (2560 x 1600) QHD+, 240Hz, 3ms, DCI-P3 100%, ComfortViewPlus, NVIDIA G-SYNC+DDS Display
Процесор:13th Gen Intel® Core™ ) i9-13900HX (36 MB cache, 24 cores, 32 threads, up to 5.40 GHz Turbo)
Графика:NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4060, 8 GB GDDR6
RAM Меморија: 32GB (2 x 16GB), DDR5, 4800 MT/s
Диск (Storage): 1 TB, M.2, PCIe NVMe, SSD
Мрежна картичка: Killer E3100 PCI-e Gigabit ethernet controller
Wi-Fi 6 AX201, 2x2, 802.11ax, Bluetooth® 5.2
Камера:Integrated widescreen HD (720p) Webcam with Single Array Digital Microphone
Порти:
1 x headset (headphone and microphone combo) port
1 x RJ45 Ethernet port
3 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports
1 x HDMI 2.1 port
1 x Thunderbolt™ 4 port with DisplayPort™
1 USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 port with DisplayPort™
Батерија: 6-Cell Battery, 86WHr (Integrated)
Позадинско осветлување на тастатурата (backlit keyboard)
Тежина: 2.87kg
